channel.title: VPS Questions
channel.description:
Alright, gotta few questions dealing with VPS shit.
First off, what is a good distro to have on the VPS? I heard debian was pretty good. [size=50px][b][u]DONT GIVE ME WINDOWS[/u][/b][/size]
Second, what are decent specs that could run an IRC server without lag? I am talking like Processor, RAM, etc.
Any other info you have, such as good and cheap hosting companies would be appreciated.
Thanks.

item.title: VPS Questions
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Thug-life:

You can run an ircd on anything, the only thing you need to worry about is stability of the connection.

Cool story bro

@op, get a media server, install any distro then just run ur server/servers

http://www.bestbuy.com/site/Linksys+-+External+USB+2.0+Network+Storage+Media+Hub/9220504.p?skuId=9220504&ci_src=14110944&ci_sku=9220504&ref=06&loc=01&id=1218062116325
